Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    ThisItem.Action,
    "Display",
    Set(varDisplay,ThisItem.Name),
    "Navigate",
    Navigate(ThisItem.Screen),
    "Launch",
    Launch(ThisItem.LaunchURL),
    false
);

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
Table(
    {
        ID: 1,
        Name: "Button1",
        Label: "Button 1",
        Action: "Display",
        Screen: App.ActiveS,
        Image: SampleImage,
        Tooltip: "Tooltip",
        LaunchURL: "",
        Color: ControlsTheme.ButtonColor,
        SelectedColor: ControlsTheme.ButtonColor,
        FillColor: ControlsTheme.NavButtonFill,
        SelectedFillColor: ControlsTheme.NavButtonSelectedFill
    },
    {
        ID: 2,
        Name: "Button2",
        Label: "Button 2",
        Action: "Display",
        Tooltip: "Tooltip"
    }
)
